body:
just an update, I am following the issue #16293 and I was thinking that the change done to the GC could be good for this issue aswell.
I am now re-running my tests with up-to-date master go source and absolute maximum latency has dropped from 200ms to 21ms 
In 1 million request/reply cycles I only had 5 occurrences over 20ms and 21 occurrences between 10ms and 20ms.
this is a great improvement!
